messages.name: maluap98
messages.content:
Ich hab mal eine Frage zur Anrechnung von Jobs auf das Stipendium.
Ich habe schon einen Job, der knapp unter der Grenze f√ºr die Anrechnung ist. Jetzt hab ich ein Angebot f√ºr einen Job √ºber ein paar Monate bekommen.
Dieser wird ja dann auf die Monate verteilt und anteilig vom Stipendium abgezogen, oder? Also lohnt es sich nur mehr als den Freibetrag zu verdienen, wenn man mehr als den individuellen Stipendien Betrag verdient?

messages.name: rudiroller2
messages.content: Der Mehrverdienst √ºber die Grenze wird eins zu eins abgezogen, das lohnt sich also nicht. Aber die Berechnung l√§uft immer auf den gesamten Berechnungszeitraum, wenn du also nur ein paar Monate mehr bekommst, k√∂nntest du immer noch mit einem Plus aus der Geschichte rausgehen.

messages.name: maluap98
messages.content: Danke !

messages.name: Izzie_Q
messages.content:
Hello lovely people,

Good friends of mine are creating a lovely, s+ partner game to help couples get more in touch with sexual desires and communicating openly about sex and intimacy. It‚Äôs called 'Curious Touch‚Äò and you can find more info about what it is on the linked website. You could help with the crowdfunding campaign or preorder the game. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

So far it‚Äôs available only in German but they‚Äôre already trying to finance an English version, too ü•≥üôå
This is the info for that:
‚ÄûHelp us expand our vision and make Curious Touch available in English. No need to pre-order the German version or donate any more. We‚Äôve introduced a new reward that lets you pledge for the English version, should it become a reality. In the unlikely event that we don‚Äôt reach the goal, you‚Äôll receive the German version instead ‚Äì a great gift for your favorite German-speaking friend or a unique keepsake for yourself.‚Äú

And here‚Äôs the German original:

Im Crowdfunding vorbestellen unter https://www.startnext.com/HJr

Erlebe als eigensinnige Katze oder als neugierige Streichelperson ein tiefsinniges, erotisches Abenteuer. Erforscht zusammen eure ganz eigene Sexualdynamik. In jeder Beziehung gibt es auch Unsicherheiten ‚Äì r√ºstet euch mit Superkr√§ften aus und stellt euch euren Erzfeinden. Ihr erkundet, was euch anmacht, spielt damit, Neues auszuprobieren und genie√üt es, Altbekanntes wiederzuentdecken. Holt euch mit Curious Touch Methoden aus Sexualtherapie, Tantra und der sexpositiven Szene nach Hause.

messages.name: ChaoSurfer23
messages.content:
Ahoy Explorers of the Inner Realms, 

I invite you to join the ParaTheater Ritual Sessions this Fall to explore your unconscious mind through your body!

Come and take a 3 hrs vacation of being a somebody by joining the Circle of NoBodies in this Ritual Medium based on the work of Antero Alli and Grotowski. 

Here we play no roles, we have no scripts, and we don't respond to prompts of the others. 

In this A-Social Format we get to dive deep within ourselves and allow the body to become the canvas for revelation between the polarities of exis-dance. 

Curious? More info and tickets here: 
https://chaosurfing.rocks/paratheater/

messages.name: sooolla
messages.content:
A fondue pot heater slightly burned the table in my flat and I am wondering if there is a way to fix it 
Anyone who knows wood has an idea ?

messages.name: mikeyankey
messages.content: My guess would be sanding and varnishing again, but I'm no woodworking specialist

messages.name: sooolla
messages.content: I also thought that but would love to avoid that option ahahah

messages.name: cupecupe
messages.content:
The best solution is probably... Acceptance.
To fix it, you have to sand it out and then apply varnish or oil again, so you'd need to know what the original product was, or at least what type. Also for some finishes it can be tricky to get the blend between the newly finished region and the rest of the table right. This is generally pretty easy if it's oiled, but with varnish it's possible that you only get a really good result by stripping and re-finishing the entire table after sanding out the dark spot...

messages.name: sooolla
messages.content:
Ahah yeah I would just accept it , but moving out of a flat soon and pretty sure they will charge me for it :( 
It‚Äôs probably gonna happen , just hope they don‚Äôt charge me the price of the table for this burn , like that would be pretty bullshit

messages.name: Ago2777
messages.content: Tablecloth

messages.name: Richardhod
messages.content:
Depends what the agents / landlords are like, perhaps. If nice, you coudl bring it up now, and ask what to do: your engagement may help them look nicely on the question, or at least negotiate in person / discursively. 
If they will charge you and not be nice about figuring it out with you, and are generally not good to deal with, perhaps then you may need to get someone in who knows how to fix these things nicely enough...?

messages.name: daniberri
messages.content:
‚ú® Calling all retreat organizers, workshop facilitators, and festival curators! ‚ú®

Are you planning something for Spring or Summer 2025? 

üëâI‚Äôm Dani, a passionate advocate for integrating menstrual cycle education into the heart of wellness, for women‚Äîand just as importantly‚Äîfor men and non-binary folks.

üíúI believe authentic well-being begins with reconnecting to our natural rhythms. The menstrual cycle is far more than a biological function‚Äîit‚Äôs the blueprint of vitality, creativity, and connection for half the population.

üåø With 12+ years in global menstrual health education + activism and recent certification as a Holistic Hormone and Cycle Coach, I bring expertise in cycle syncing, nutrition, embodiment, perimenopause prep, and pleasure to help people truly appreciate the magic that menstrual cycles can offer.

‚ú® I'd love to work together to make 2025 a year of transformation and powerful community growth in the face of so much chaos! ‚ú®

ü©∏LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniellekeiser/
ü©∏Insta: https://www.instagram.com/danikalifornia009/
ü©∏Web: https://dani-health.com/ 
ü©∏Real time: https://calendly.com/danielle-keiser/chittychat 

Get in touch to chat about how we can work together to create soulful, precious experiences for your future participants.

üì∏ by K. Knimman, 2024

messages.name: Anonymous
messages.content:
Hi Everyone üî•

Acceptance emails have been sent out! That means its time to start officially getting fully involved üéäby filling in your acceptance form as well as checking your tent rental  form quantities! That is your responsibility and the longer it takes to confirm the less chance we have to secure them ü•≤ even if Cloud asked you already.

You will also have received your DDT's. Quite a few haven't bought them yet and you only have untill MONDAY 2 December to buy them.(that's next week) Otherwise you will have to buy in general which can be stressful! 

We can't wait to get started with you and all the wonderful ideas for camp this year that we all can create together ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

Keep your eyes peeled for the first general meeting which is happening on Monday 2 December at 6:30pm South African time . You have been sent calendar invites üòä

See you soon !

Reach out if you have any questions

messages.name: Dominik Heilscher
messages.content:
If you are looking for a short-term solution for a flat in Berlin, you might want to check out https://theberlinhouse.com/. Located in Friedenau, close to U9. That is the place where I am living since september. Advantage is that the apartments have a cancellation period of only 1 month, and they aren‚Äôt especially picky in their choice of tenants. And the official 6-months limit is legal boilerplate- some of my neighbors have been living in this house for years.
You can write a quick 1-line mail to the facility manager:  sayhello@theberlinhouse.com

I know that they have free apartments right now, because there was an apartment viewing event yesterday.
And to anyone reading this at a later point in time: There is a good chance that at any given time one of the 80 rooms in this house is available.

messages.name: WuschelSchulz
messages.content:
For anyone having a Starlink Dishüí´ü•£:

I will be giving a AI safety (MechInterp) course from the 27th of december to the 6th of january at the Winteracademy of a german student accociation (CdE)

Because this course will be heldt at a somwhat remote location, we would greatly benifit from faster (or just reliable) internet. Anyone who could lend us their StarLink connection for these 11 days, might earn some solomn thaks some sweet counterfactual Impact!üôèüôèü´∂
